title: 谬的托词
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]
Found as an **aardvark**  In the Euro
错误之人于错误之处
@@@@
Born with castellated faces
丑陋脸庞是我生来被给予的礼物
@@@@
Without any luck of the grace
作为那千万个戴罪的灵魂
@@@@
“Ado,Ado”They called me to dance
命运何会不待我不公？
@@@@
As one of the damned,nerveless
他们使唤着我
@@@@
Should done
我终究无力反抗
@@@@

------

All Dead,All Dead.
挥之一炬罢
@@@@
Destroy all the old memoria
忘却一切回忆
@@@@
‘nd then decided 
无论如何
@@@@
As menfolk
担起这一切
@@@@
Although a mendacity so did
尽管谬误之种已经埋下
@@@@

------

Passing away,and back
流出的鲜血回注到创口
@@@@
Noise in my addled brain
在这势利之地
@@@@
Stay among **Aerobic bacteRia**
我的大脑早已昏昏沉沉
@@@@
Then called as Adsurdus
混乱已靡于黑暗之中
@@@@

------

So liberalize all the libido
尽情纵欲吧
@@@@
Break down the stairway 
本来就不曾留念那所谓天堂
@@@@
“THE heaven ” is just the new shit
更何况那只是一个谎言——如我们一样混蛋
@@@@
Let’s speed in the highway and into the hell
直奔邪恶罢，本就是“恶”之所生
@@@@
We——all the fucked ones
不曾洗涤罪恶的命运多舛之人
@@@@
Why not have a drink on me?
不妨麻痹自己直至消逝
author: WolfsWilson
